name: Timmy Hover Board: 2021
description:
Timmy Hover Board : 2021

Timmy Riding the hoverboard in an endless runner game full of traps.

HOVERBOARD. TIMMY. ADVENTURE. TRAPS!
Timmy Hover is an action endless runner game about hoverboarding boy! You need to Navigate your way through the tracks or world full of traps. In each level there are 3 mile stones, 2500, 4500 and 10000. Completing these will give you Stars and also set an high score to see how much you are skilled to avoid traps which are waiting for you.

These traps are going to be generated randomly to make sure you will never meet the same sequence twice. Every time it going to be new sequence which make it very challenging for you.

PYRAMID: It a track deep under the pyramid with different type of types which gets active because of your presence. Try you best to get 3 stars.

DARK TUNNEL: Its a never ending darkness with booby trap! Red Light at the end gives a spooky feel.

WOODSLIDE: It a slide made up of wood like half pipe. In this character is a red ball which moving in a fast pace.

SPACERING: It a black track leading into space where special spikes are waiting to pinch you.

GRID: World of Grid is collection of boxes gathered together to form a track. you hit the box you die.

Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.PranayMunda.TimmyHover
